html:
1.7.24  8:11 pm   What instrument is making the high pitched ding dongy sounds in the last chorus of movie star?

      a bell

1.7.24  5:46 pm   was that a real harp in the song When I Get Older starting at the line "then the song will sing me"? it complements the other sounds. can we expect more harp in the future?

      i've probably used that in every song for the past 9 years

1.7.24  3:49 pm   a gnome just ran past you. Did you see it

      yes, it was the statement before the question that you didn't offer me the opportunity to dispute

1.7.24  3:46 pm   How do I get out of my addiction

      i'm not sure. that's really hard to do. the strategy varies depending on the addiction. all i know is that you can do it

1.7.24  3:02 pm   bill, do you like pufferfish? 

      almost

1.7.24  2:30 pm   would you make a game?

      sure

1.7.24  2:27 pm   do you know any other languages?

      almost

1.7.24  2:02 pm   How do you feel about haikus?

     it's probably more than just a syllable counting game, but it's been popularized as such for american schoolchildren

     Would you ever write one? 

     i'm not sure

1.7.24  1:50 pm   What's wrong?

      it's hard to tell. sometimes it feels like everything's wrong but that's surely not true either

1.7.24  1:47 pm   How can i stay focused while studying for my computer graphics exam

      i was going to suggest some things to help you focus on other things besides the exam. then i realized that's probably not what you're looking for here. i've never studied for an exam

1.7.24  1:34 pm   What is your favorite group activity?

      juggling

1.7.24  1:18 pm   hey bill what do you optimize for in your ueqstion answering, ease to answer, quality of answer, funnuniness of answer, or just whatever

      all those different approaches at one time or another. but over all i'm just living

1.7.24  12:27 pm   Can you go to space and find aliens?

      it may be possible

1.7.24  9:12 am   hey Bill, how do you make your drums sound so "organic" (english not my first language) if you write them in MIDI? (im assuming you write then unllin MIDI), if not, do you play an electric drum? 

      it's not quite any of those things, but they are played

1.7.24  7:24 am   how do i become motivated to create things

      how did you become motivated to become motivated to create things

1.7.24  4:05 am   Bill do you personally like to address friends by name, or do you prefer to address them with a nickname? Simply "you"? Affectionate insult?

      unless there are more than 2 of us in the room, it's not necessary to use names at all. you're already there. just talk to them

1.7.24  3:50 am   When creating music I feel like there's a certain logic to how the thing wants to fit together, but when it comes to adding video on top of it, it feels like a daunting free-for-all with so many potentially viable options. How do you decide what visuals to add atop a song?

     start by doing things you probably shouldn't do. that should set you on the right track

1.7.24  3:43 am   Do you often go to live music shows?

      no, but that doesn't mean they aren't good

1.7.24  3:13 am   during my first semester of college, i was a more productive writer than i've ever been, even though i had to balance music between classes and an active social life. now i'm spending time at home during christmas break, and i can't seem to get anything out. i'm just kinda sleeping and eating, and whenever i open my notebook or my music software, i can't get anything going. i'm at the point where i can't even imagine being excited about songwriting anymore. have you ever experienced anything like this, and do you have any tips?

     this may be the right moment to discover something different than songwriting, at least for now

      also, do you think it's likely that things will go back to normal when i go back to college in a week?

      based on your explanation that seems likely

1.7.24  2:00 am   thoughts on mongolian people

      i'm not sure if i know any mongolian people

1.7.24  1:46 am   helloooo. I try to avoid creating resolutions this time of year but I do set aside some time for reflection. Today I realized that I've been focusing on "getting through the day" in order to live my life rather than actually actively choosing fun things to do, that I like to do. For this reason I am making a list of delightful things to do. Do you have any suggestions?

      yes. you can put some boxes in a box. and if you don't like doing that, then as an alternative you will probably enjoy not doing it

1.7.24  12:21 am   Hey Bill, Can I ask you a question?

      ah but did you ask first if you could ask if you could ask a question

1.6.24  11:45 pm   what was your favorite grade when you were in school

      B

1.6.24  10:32 pm   how did you learn programming?

      look at an existing program and then figure out what each part does

1.6.24  9:47 pm   qu'est-ce que tu as déjà fait 1000 fois?

      réveiller

1.6.24  9:30 pm   if an omnipotent being said that they would answer any 1 question you had, what would that be

      nothing, that sounds like clickbait

1.6.24  8:03 pm   hi bill! can you suggest me a new profession? I'm kind of tired of my actual one.

      i'd need to know what your current one is. but have you thought about being a job creator

1.6.24  7:28 pm   how do you feel about walking

      good

1.6.24  7:04 pm   What is your favorite big bang theory episode

      i have not seen any, so i assume the pilot

1.6.24  6:36 pm   How can I be as awesome as you?

      that will happen automatically

1.6.24  5:30 pm   what do you think of a singular ant

      it's fine

1.6.24  4:45 pm   Do you like musicals?

      sure

1.6.24  4:45 pm   Whats your least favorite food?

      i must have blocked it out of my memory

1.6.24  2:29 pm   hi bill i am having a mental crisis because i am finally getting to do all of the creative things that i wanted to do but i am also so busy that i am losing my mind what should i do

      make a list. even make a list of lists if you have to

1.6.24  1:07 pm   is it possible to like everything?

      at different times, yes

1.6.24  10:19 am   wrong person to ask but how to be an engineer and go to a good engineer school

      it's possible that those could be separate activities, but what do i know

1.6.24  10:14 am   Since you can play the same note on multiple different strings on guitar, how do you know which string to pluck when reading sheet music without tabs?

      you decide. it's like when reading on piano, you can decide which finger to use. or when you are reading words, to speak, you can decide whether to say "either" or "either" (or neither)

1.6.24  9:55 am   What is the best rabbit habitat?

      in a tree, or maybe just near a tree

1.6.24  9:06 am   In here comes the sun, why was sadness portrayed as a happy face.

     for fun

      When it turns into a sad face then turns back into a happy face does that mean they are having some kind of issue but they are forced to happy to hide that fact?

     it was likely taking advantage of a rhythmic moment of the music

1.6.24  8:59 am   what song have you enjoyed creating the most?

      i would prefer to make a new one to be my favorite

1.6.24  8:33 am   are the sandles you kicked off still flying to this day

      that was fiction. nevermind, yes

1.6.24  8:14 am   if i like apples, should i like pears?

      no, but you could

1.6.24  7:35 am   what is your favourite video of yours that you've made

      i would prefer to make a new one to be my favorite

1.6.24  7:32 am   What was your favourite song to create?

      i would prefer to make a new one to be my favorite

1.6.24  6:04 am   hello yes id like to get proof of self

      ok, first you need to submit proof of self

1.6.24  4:51 am   Is this website part of an ARG? It feels like it

      i assume you mean Advanced Rhetoric Group, and yes

1.6.24  2:57 am   what is music, and also, how do i do it?

      no one knows, but that's great news if you figure it out because then you'd be the first

1.6.24  2:54 am   if you could travel to any place at any point in time where would you go first

     here

1.6.24  1:33 am   does time exist, or are we stuck in an infinitely small point in time

      we are not frozen in time or else you wouldn't be able to ask this

1.6.24  12:40 am   what do I do if I pissed off this person at my school who is really good with computers and hates me and wants to destroy my $2000 PC

      are you able to relocate to antarctica
